ygData.msgSnippet: Time to bring back ... SCRAT! Most people probably don t remember him, but he s a three foot tall cowardly squirrel bot who crashed on earth in a tiny stasis

Time to bring back ... SCRAT! Most people probably don't remember 
him, but he's a three foot tall cowardly squirrel bot who crashed on 
earth in a tiny stasis pod, got scared of his own shadow, and then 
was forgotten by me soon after.

::Scrat::

A trembling three foot tall form stood behind some bushes, watching 
the group of bots with curiousity and fright. Scrat knew he should 
probably run away, but his curiosity was overtaking him.

Good thing there wasn't a saying "Curiosity killed the squirrel." And 
besides, Scrat had his trusty dagger with him, although he was sure 
that if the bots made a move toward him, he'd scramble.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> ::Windlord::
> 
> "The femme got worryed and ran trying to find you... " he sighed
